Order.label: Autoregressive order of the VAR model

EstimationSpan.label: Date range for estimation, not including initial conditions

IdentificationHorizon.label: Number of periods for shock responses

TrendType.label: String list matching the number of endogenous variables; specifies the trend type for each variable. Accepted values are 'constant', 'linear', or 'quadratic'

NumRegimes.label: Indicating how many regimes each endogenous variable has

Bounds.label: Specifying lower and upper bounds for the constants. Different bounds can be set for different regimes; these must be listed in the order of the regimes

RegimeSpans.label: Spans of each regime. If a regime reappears, it should be included again within the same element
